name: Générer des vidéos promotionnelles AI pour des produits avec GPT-4o, Fal.ai et supervision humaine
description:
![templateheaderimage.JPG](fileId:2009)

Générez des clips vidéo AI pour promouvoir des produits, des services ou des événements sur les réseaux sociaux. Utilisez **gotoHuman** comme interface pour contrôler et superviser chaque étape du flux de travail afin de créer un contenu qui vaut vraiment la peine d'être publié.
## Comment ça fonctionne
gotoHuman affichera les étapes du flux de travail qui nécessitent une approbation ou une contribution dans sa boîte de réception et vous notifiera par e-mail ou Slack.
![slacknotifyborder.JPG](fileId:2005)
1. Nous choisissons parmi différents sujets pour notre publication suggérés par l'IA
![topicsstepcropped.JPG](fileId:2006)
2. Nous sélectionnons le style d'image, un produit à montrer, et examinons une phrase d'accroche générée par l'IA
![contentstep.JPG](fileId:2007)
3. Nous utilisons Fal.ai pour générer une image qui sert d'image de référence pour notre clip vidéo. Et nous utilisons Cloudinary pour ajouter un superposition pour la phrase d'accroche.
Nous examinons l'image dans gotoHuman et pouvons itérer dessus en réessayant ou même en changeant l'invite.
![imageaichat2.JPG](fileId:2008)
4. Nous examinons le clip vidéo généré avec Fal.ai basé sur l'image approuvée et pouvons, encore une fois, réessayer ou redemander.
![reviewclip.gif](fileId:2010)

## Comment configurer

1. **Le plus important, installez le nœud gotoHuman avant d'importer ce modèle !**
(Ajoutez simplement le nœud à une toile vierge avant d'importer)
2. Suivez les instructions affichées tout au long du flux de travail et dans le guide vidéo inclus. Vous devez principalement
- configurer vos identifiants pour gotoHuman, OpenAI, Fal.ai et Cloudinary
- dans gotoHuman, sélectionner et créer le modèle de révision préconstruit "Agent vidéo promotionnel" ou importer ces ID :
`Z7V1jyImY1pho9eY039R,0GBaOCWd27tqV562kkCL,E2wlCVPWmk2UnLHVt4uu,DitPdbIapS4rBxBTIYGt,Z2T7nFwkXVFQlD6z50eV`
- sélectionner ces modèles dans les nœuds gotoHuman
- faire une configuration rapide pour Cloudinary

## Exigences

Vous avez besoin de comptes pour
- gotoHuman (supervision humaine)
- OpenAI (idéation)
- Fal.ai (génération d'images/vidéos)
- Cloudinary (superposition de texte)

## Comment personnaliser

- Ajustez/Remplacez les déclencheurs de flux de travail selon vos besoins
- Changez l'invite dans le nœud de génération de sujets
- Remplacez les URL d'images de produits utilisées dans le nœud "gotoHuman - Contenu"
- Ajustez les styles disponibles pour la génération d'images dans le modèle de révision gotoHuman et les invites auxquelles ils sont liés dans le nœud "Définir l'invite d'image initiale"
- Ajustez l'invite utilisée pour la génération de vidéos dans le nœud "Définir l'invite vidéo initiale"
- Si vous souhaitez utiliser un service/modèle différent pour la génération d'images et de vidéos, remplacez les nœuds liés à Fal.ai.
- De plus, si vous n'avez pas besoin d'une superposition de texte, supprimez les nœuds Cloudinary.

parameters.text:
=I'm running an online store for ceramics.
Please come up with 5 ideas for a topic for a short social media marketing post.
Primarily adjust it to the current season, considering the current month (Today is {{ $today.format('dd/LL/yyyy') }}) and our customers are in the northern hemisphere.

Come up with a background scenery (e.g. beach, city, park, garden, cabin, office,...), a specific situation (e.g. picnic, day at the beach, party, regular office day,..) and a target audience (e.g. families, party singles, outdoor couples,startups,..)

assignments.name: prompt

parameters.content:
## 1. Generate campaign ideas
We ask the LLM to generate ideas for our upcoming marketing campaign based on the current date/season.
In gotoHuman we choose our favorite and approve.
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)

## 2. Generate tag line (self-improving) & pick settings for image generation
We are going to place a text label (tag line) on top of our video and we ask AI to generate it for us.
To **allow our workflow to learn over time**, we are fetching previously approved tag lines from gotoHuman to incl. in our prompt as positive examples.

In gotoHuman we edit the scenery of the image, pick the desired style and product to show. We can also manually edit the tag line OR ask AI to retry (we can change the prompt as well)
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)

## 3. Generate reference product image
Using the approved settings we ask Fal.ai to generate the image that our short video clip will be based on.
We then use Cloudinary to put the tag line as a boxed label on top of it.
In gotoHuman, we check the image and can ask for a retry. Clicking the chat button allows us to edit the prompt before retrying which is very useful with images.
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)

## 5. Post to social media
We receive the URL of the final human-approved video clip in the response from gotoHuman and can now use it to publish it.
Alternatively, you can download the video clip from gotoHuman and post it manually.
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)

## 4. Turn image into video clip
We use Fal.ai again to generate a short video clip based on our reference image, basically making it more vivid.
Again, we use Cloudinary to put the tag line on top of the video.
In gotoHuman, we check the video and again, can ask for a retry (also allowing prompt edits)
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)

assignments.name: video

parameters.content: ![e](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6893ca394b196bb6438732a3_topics-step.JPG)
![e](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6893ca39c3a320231f3a9271_content-step.JPG)
![e](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6893ca39392754f280752980_image-step.JPG)
![e](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6893ca39f9d345b58541c664_video-step.JPG)
![e](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6893ca39d91d94647ceb31c6_image-ai-chat.JPG)

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Select your gotoHuman credentials from the list

[ ] Select review template "Review Clip" from list

assignments.name: metaJson
assignments.value: ={   "_gthWorkflow": {     "runName": "{{ $('Remote manual trigger').isExecuted ? $('Remote manual trigger').item.json.body.responseValues.campaignName.value : "Campaign " + $('Schedule Trigger').item.json.Month + " " + $('Schedule Trigger').item.json.Year + ", " + $('Schedule Trigger').item.json['Day of month'] }}"   } }

parameters.content:
## Create AI product videos with Fal.ai using [gotoHuman](https://www.gotohuman.com) for supervision
Let's say we are a shop selling ceramics and want to showcase one of our products on social media each week.
This mainly demonstrates how to use **gotoHuman** to supervise each step of the workflow.

@[youtube](mjjkPjCubns)

### ⚠️ How to set up
[ ] In n8n, install gotoHuman node **before** importing this template or some settings will be missing (Just add the node to a blank canvas before importing)

[ ] Create gotoHuman account, copy API key

[ ] In gotoHuman, select and create the pre-built review template **Promo video agent** or import these IDs: `Z7V1jyImY1pho9eY039R,0GBaOCWd27tqV562kkCL,E2wlCVPWmk2UnLHVt4uu,DitPdbIapS4rBxBTIYGt,Z2T7nFwkXVFQlD6z50eV`
(copy&paste this whole comma-separated list of IDs)
[ ] Follow further instructions in the yellow notes below

### Requirements
- gotoHuman account for human supervision
- OpenAI account for ideation and tag line generation
- Fal.ai account for image/video generation
- Cloudinary account for adding a text layer on top of image/video

### How to customize
- Adjust/Replace the workflow triggers as needed
- Change the prompt in the topics generation node
- Replace the product image URLs used in the "gotoHuman - Content" node
- Adjust the available styles for image generation in the gotoHuman review template and the prompts they link to in the "Set Initial Image Prompt" node
- Remove Cloudinary if you do not need a text overlay
- Adjust the prompt used for video generation in the "Set Initial Video Prompt" node

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Select your gotoHuman credentials from the list

[ ] Select review template "Review Ref Image" from list

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] You need a Fal.ai account
[ ] Choose "Generic Credential Type" > "Header Auth" > Name: `Authorization`, Value: `Key YOUR-API-KEY`

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] You need a cloudinary.com account
[ ] In Cloudinary, find your environment/cloud name
[ ] In Cloudinary, [add an upload preset](https://console.cloudinary.com/settings/upload/presets). Enter a name, set signing mode to **Unsigned** and enter asset folder name. Leave rest as is. Save.
[ ] In this node, enter names of environment and upload preset (no credential req.)

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Select your gotoHuman credentials from the list

[ ] Select review template "Product,..." from list

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Select credential type "gotoHuman API"

[ ] Select your gotoHuman credentials from the list

[ ] For `formId` enter the ID of your gotoHuman review template "Product,..."

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Add the webhook URL shown in this node to the settings of the review template "Create Campaign" in gotoHuman

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Add gotoHuman credentials with your API key

[ ] Select review template "Topic Ideas" from list

user.name: gotoHuman
user.bio:
Approve critical actions in gotoHuman’s customizable review interface and edit AI outputs manually or by looping back to your workflow.
Ensure AI-generated content is on-brand, messages to customers are accurate, and high-stakes decisions are made by humans.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
